newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgarian president renews call for snap election.
newsitem.headline: Bulgarian president renews call for snap election.

text.p: Bulgarian President Petar Stoyanov on Friday renewed his call for immediate elections to ease the turbulent Balkan country's deep economic and political crisis.

Stoyanov, who was returning from a visit to European Union headquarters in Brussels, told reporters that Interior Minister Nikolai Dobrev should give up his efforts to form a new Socialist government and opt for immediate elections.
